# Hexagony-IDE
This tool allows you to develop [Hexagony](https://github.com/m-ender/hexagony) program on browser. 

[Try on github.io](https://akouryy.github.io/hexagony-ide/#NDgkPnssPC5fX1w9PC4nLikpPiIqe1wtLS4uXycqLl88Pj48LyoiPSoxIi8ufC5fPS89fS09LiRcQH59fHw+Kj0iXC49Li5fLSIuXy9fXCt9Ly4nJz48KCo+XHwuPCInXy4hMT0uPl8qJydfX1x+PFw8,)

## Features
- [x] Minify/Hexagonize Hexagony programs.
- [x] Interpret them.
- [ ] Debug them.
- [x] Visualize IP moves
- [ ] ...and memory access.
